listings.title: Senior Data Scientist
listings.description: We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join our growing team. You will develop machine learning models and extract valuable insights from large datasets.
qualifications: Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
5+ years of experience in data science roles
Strong programming skills in Python and SQL
Experience with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
listings.experience_required: 5+ years of experience in data science roles
listings.education_required: Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field

listings.title: Software Engineer
listings.description: We're seeking a talented Software Engineer to develop high-quality applications. You'll be responsible for designing, coding, and modifying applications according to specifications.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
listings.education_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
